verses.roman:
tumi ta' īśvara baṭa,--sākṣāt nārāyaṇa
kṛpā kari' kara mora saṁsāra mocana

synonyms: tumi—you; ta'-certainly; īśvara—the Lord; baṭa—are; sākṣāt—directly; nārāyaṇa—the Supreme Lord, Nārāyaṇa; kṛpā kari'-showing mercy; kara—please do; mora—My; saṁsāra—material life; mocana—deliverance.
translation: "Sir, you are directly Nārāyaṇa. Therefore please be merciful unto Me. Deliver Me from this material bondage."
